rules_text:
[i](As this enters, insert it into one of your three programs. At your first main phase each turn, the next program runs all its Subroutines.)[/i]
Whenever this Subroutine runs, exile up to one other target creature or enchantment. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
notes:
!tokens Program A ERR;Program B ERR;Program C ERR
!
type B
